Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. This product is truly a masterpiece, embodying quality, functionality, and style. We believe its worth far exceeds its asking price, but we're willing to let you experience it for a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you can purchase this remarkable item for $145. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our product. If you have any questions or need more information, feel free to ask. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $145. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $145
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
